system.description:
You have combined disciplined training and sheer fury into a very aggressive fighting style, and are able to manifest claws to help you tear into your foes. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Dexterity, or Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You gain claws on your hands and feet. This may represent a supernatural change or merely strengthening and/or sharpening your existing fingernails. In any case, your unarmed attacks can now deal piercing or slashing damage in addition to bludgeoning. You choose the damage type when you make an unarmed attack.
  • You can use your unarmed attacks with Furious Critical.
  • You gain proficiency with the Tooth and Claw combat tradition and a maneuver from it of a level you could learn. It does not count against your maneuvers known.
  • Half your berserker levels count as adept levels for the purpose of the Extra Attack feature.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in adept, 3 levels in berserker
